div.h2: WUSD SCHOOLS AND PLAYGROUNDS ARE CLOSED

div.p:
WUSD SCHOOLS, including all PLAYGROUNDS, are officially CLOSED for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year, in response to the latest executive "Safer at Home" order issued by Governor Tony Evers on April 16th, 2020.
Please click here for the latest family information from Superintendent Cassandra Schug and visit our COVID-19 webpage for additional information and resources.
Meal pick up information may be found here: English & Spanish.
WUSD Families - please complete this brief survey so we can better serve your student(s) during this time: English Survey Spanish Survey.
If you need immediate assistance, please email your building administrator or call (920)262-1460.
We will get through this together - #WatertownWay!

Rigorous and relevant learning for ALL!

h3.span: 4K and 5K Online Enrollment for 2020-21 School Year NOW OPEN!
4K and 5K Online Enrollment for 2020-21 School Year NOW OPEN!

div.p: Please turn up your volume and enjoy our video.
